snippet.title: Love Shore - Official Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Check out the trailer for Love Shore, an upcoming narrative and dating sim game where two cyborgs must survive 5 days in a cyberpunk city that never sleeps. In Love Shore, play as Sam or Farah as you investigate your own origins in the aftermath of a decaying megacorporation, confront gods doubling as underworld criminal kingpins, save your friends, and find love amidst the chaos of uncertain existence.

#GameTrailers #SoG #Gaming
